Class AbstractCompilationError

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Error
radin.core.errorhandling.AbstractCompilationError
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmbiguousIdentifierError, AmbiguousMethodCallError, CompilationError, CXMappedType.BadDelayedTypeAccessError, IllegalCastError, IllegalTypesForOperationError, IncorrectTypeError, MethodDoesNotExistError, ParsingError, TokenizationError, TypeNotDefinedError
public abstract class AbstractCompilationError
extends Error

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractCompilationError​(String error, List<Token> correspondingTokens, String... errorInformation)
    Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.
    AbstractCompilationError​(String error, Token correspondingToken, String errorInformation)
    Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.

    Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.
    AbstractCompilationError​(List<Token> correspondingTokens, String... errorInformation)
    Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.
    AbstractCompilationError​(Token correspondingToken, String errorInformation)
    Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.

    • AbstractCompilationError

      public AbstractCompilationError​(String error, List<Token> correspondingTokens, String... errorInformation)
      Create a compilation error object for useful error messages The size of the error information array must be <= the size of the correspond tokens Anything after that will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      error - error string
      correspondingTokens - the corresponding tokens to point to
      errorInformation - helpful information strings

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      public AbstractCompilationError.ErrorInformation getInfo​(int index)
      Get the info at an index If the token does not have a corresponding error information, a null string is passed;
      Parameters:
      index - the index of a token
      Returns:
      an Error information token;

    • getInfo

      public List<AbstractCompilationError.ErrorInformation> getInfo​(boolean sort)
      Returns a list of all ErrorInformation objects for this error.
      Parameters:
      sort - whether to sort the output based on line number and column
      Returns:
      the resulting list
